Control Name: 3.3 Ensure the S3 bucket used to store CloudTrail logs is not publicly accessible
Control Statement: CloudTrail logs a record of every API call made in your AWS account. These logs file are stored in an S3 bucket. It is recommended that the bucket policy, or access control list (ACL), applied to the S3 bucket that CloudTrail logs to prevents public access to the CloudTrail logs.
